portfolio.title: Bishop's Training & Fitness
portfolio.description: I consider this site to have been one of my more complex endeavors. It was originally built using Dreamweaver and, eventually, rebuilt into a custom WordPress child theme. As the business continued to develop customer touchpoints, it became imperative to create an extensible interface. The result was a site that provided essential business information, brand recognition, real-time social feeds, and enhanced responsiveness.

portfolio.title: Doctors' Management Service, Inc.
portfolio.description: Redesigned website for presentation, expansion for social media streaming, info arch, and brand reinforcement. Coded template for multiple browser platforms. As a result of the redesign, hits immediately went up 244% (March to April). Job seekers have also submitted resumes through the site which is an unexpected result of the design's focus on usabiltiy and accessibility.

portfolio.title: Stoughton Community Events
portfolio.description: Acting as web consultant and webmaster, SCEC's site is a portal for all Stoughton residents to be able to learn about events throughout the year.

portfolio.title: Stoughton Bakery
portfolio.description: Redesign of website to reflect rebrand, focus on business services, and introduce social news feed. Maintenance includes update of business content, HTML5 & CSS3 implementation, device & browser compatible responsive design.
